sentences.sentence: It will also allow more litter to be sampled when using a limited number of funnels.
sentences.translation: 在漏斗数量有限的情况下，也能够对更多的废弃物进行取样。

sentences.sentence: Along the road, funnels of dark grey smoke rose from bombed villages.
sentences.translation: 沿那条公路，暗灰色烟成漏斗状从遭到轰炸的村庄里升起。

sentences.sentence: Yurbuds ($20) are curved silicone funnels that snap onto standard cheapo earbuds.
sentences.translation: Yurbuds（20美元）是一种弯曲漏斗状的硅胶，用来接到一般的比较便宜的耳塞上。
